title: Journeymen: Taming the Epic
description:
The weather worsened, the climbing got harder and the riders were tested as the 2014 Absa Cape Epic went on. Our three Journeymen continued their attempts at taming the untamable. 

Directed by:
Troy Davies

Produced by:
Retroyspective

Additional footage courtesy of:

Bigshot Media:
Official video supplier to the ABSA Cape Epic

World of Heroes - GoPro South Africa:
Official POV camera supplier to the ABSA Cape Epic

Craig Kolesky:
ION cameras South Africa

asset.author: Oakley
